Question.Subject: can you use the same piece of paper from another wish,in real-wishes?
Question.Content:
coz i lost my other one? can i use the 8 paper from my other wish for the wish that i am also doing? please answer... thanks! xx
By the Power of 8!!- lol
Question.ChosenAnswer:
No dear,
its not the paper or magic that makes it work, its you, but at the same time the only thing standing in your way is you. I have alot to tell you and if you wanna know more how to make your wish come true please pm me... I have became a werewolf (well half...kind of) well not really a full werewolf but I have shifted a paw and thats enough to prove to me anythings possible.
-Maria
Happy Howling! =)

Answer.Reference: If theres a door, theres a way to open it.
